Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to Home Page.
2. Type 'XYZ NonExistent Product' into the search bar.
3. Click the search icon.
Expected Result: SEARCHED PRODUCTS' title is displayed. Message 'No Results Found' or similar is displayed below the title.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to Home Page.
2. Type '!@#$%^&*' into the search bar.
3. Click the search icon.
Expected Result: SEARCHED PRODUCTS' title is displayed. Message 'No Results Found' or similar is displayed. System should not crash or display errors.
